page.title: 14Recreation(1)
page.content: {NORTH BRIDGE LEISURE CENTRE}is a modern complex with 3 multi-purpose halls.Any indoor sport can be played, excluding swimming.However,a swimming pool and outside playing fields may be built in the future.The complex has changing facilities and toilets for the disabled,although there is not the convenience of a lift. {THE HALIFAX SWIMMING POOL}is in the town centre and boasts facilities for squash and weight training.Various swimming clubs use the pool and swimming lessons are given. {HALIFAX HARRIERS}was formed in 1884 to help athletes.They train long distance runners and sprinters.Field events are also practised.Their vest has a sky-blue strip.
